<math alttext="14.3"><mn>14.3</mn></math>

The table presents values for a function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> at selected values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>. A quartic regression is used to model the data. What is the value of <math alttext="g open parentheses 6.5 close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mn>6.5</mn></mfenced></math> predicted by the quartic function model?

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
